channel.title: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
channel.description:
Hey, i just started rsps about 3 weeks ago and know a little about coding. Anyway lets cut to the chase.
I've used utorrent to host my server and have done everything A-OK i even took the time to see if it was online by checking at google server status checker and it said it was online this is what i've done.
First opened and enabled no-ip Second - open run.bat (server sided) Third and lastly - opened utorrent.
I've added the correct ip adress to the client and then compiled and when i check on my brothers computer it says "error connecting to server" . Now can you please help via teamviewer, or is it just that me and my brother are on the same ip-adress.A

item.title: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Go to CMD and IPconfig, two numbers that start with 192.168 should show, tell your brother to use the one that doesn’t end in 1.1 it should be like 192.168.1.9 but it can go into double figures, this number will change every time your router is restarted

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server

item.title: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:5, topic:400257”]Wait so your trying to both connect at the same house/ip?

If it’s a PI, go into Config.java and search for IPS_ALLOWED and change that to 2.

Cheers. ;)[/quote]

Looks like i’ve learnt something today as well!

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server

item.title: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Wait so your trying to both connect at the same house/ip?

If it’s a PI, go into Config.java and search for IPS_ALLOWED and change that to 2.

Cheers.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
item.dc:creator: @cows_go_moo cows go moo
item.description:
@cows_go_moo wrote:

Thanks for the heads up, they’ve both come up positive. But one probably stupid question.

How do i get my brother, and me both to play the server. We are hosting on the same ip, but different computers can you please tell me. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server

item.title: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

no need to worry.

You cannot play the same server on the same IP.

Well, i think thats correct^

Ring one your mates up and ask them to try!

Also go on http://canyouseeme.org and type 43594 in the port.

Then go to http://runelocus.com and change the status checker to your IP, if these both come back positive, there is no real reason why your server should not be working.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape if you help me get my client working or server
